Detailed Description

cvmx_stx::_com_ctl

STX_COM_CTL - TX Common Control Register

Notes: Restrictions: Both the calendar table and the LEN and M parameters must be completely setup before writing the Interface enable (INF_EN) and Status channel enabled (ST_EN) asserted.
